Hi @alrojo,

At training time, you can also do something similar (replacing lines 78-83 in your seq2seq_test):

``` python
outputs = layers.linear(outputs, num_decoder_symbols, scope=decoder_scope)
```

Make sure you pass in the same scope for both training and testing. 

Does that help?
